plotStackedLineGraph

public void plotStackedLineGraph(List<VCanvasPlotter.Graph> graphs)
Plots a line graph where the lines position depends on each other.

Parameters:
graphs - The list of graphs to plot. First graph is plotted bottom most and sequential graphs on top of the previous one.

plotBarGraph

public void plotBarGraph(List<VCanvasPlotter.Graph> graphs)
Plots a bar graph with overlapping graphs. Orders bars so the bar with the least value is topmost.
